alert.note: Alert for Lincoln County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 19 at 1:55PM PST until January 20 at 10:00AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST FRIDAY ABOVE 5500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 5500 feet. Total snow accumulations up to 4 inches possible. North winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Lincoln County. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions along Highway 93 north of Panaca, State Route 319, and State Route 320.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
